title: Government Loan & Support Schemes for Farmers
description: Explore various government-backed loan programs and financial support schemes available for farmers across India.

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.description: Provides timely credit support to farmers for agricultural and allied activities, including post-harvest expenses.

schemes.name: PMFBY - Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme providing coverage against crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

schemes.name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
schemes.description: Provides medium-to-long term debt financing for investment in viable projects for post-harvest management infrastructure.
